InvitationPillarSpawnAmount.Description: Amount of pillars that spawn at the start of the trial

InvitationPillarDefaultAuraDistance.Description: Base kit aura distance for the pillars

InvitationPillarOfferingAuraDistance.Description: Aura distance for the pillars when the offering is equiped

InvitationInteractionDurationKiller.Description: Duration of the Killer's Invitation interaction, in seconds

InvitationInteractionDurationSurvivor.Description: Duration of the Survivor's Invitation interaction, in seconds

InvitationInteractionCooldown.Description: Time for pillar to have a charge back after player interaction.

InvitationChargeGainKiller.Description: Number of charge(s) gained by Killers after collecting an Invitation

InvitationChargeGainSurvivor.Description: Number of charge(s) gained by Survivors after collecting an Invitation

MaxNumberOfChargesKiller.Description: Total number of charges that can be held by Killers

MaxNumberOfChargesSurvivor.Description: Total number of charges that can be held by Survivors

ChargeRechargeRateKillerInChase.Description: Number of charges regained per second while in chase for Killers

ChargeRechargeRateKillerOutChase.Description: Number of charges regained per second while out of chase for Killers

ChargeRechargeRateSurvivorInChase.Description: Number of charges regained per second while in chase for Survivors

ChargeRechargeRateSurvivorOutChase.Description: Number of charges regained per second while out of chase for Survivors

AbilityInChaseCooldown.Description: Cooldown timer between usage of abilities, in seconds

InvitationAbilitiesMaxHeightDifference.Description: cm, Maximum height difference between the player and the target for it to be valid

FragilePalletDistance.Description: cm, Maximum distance for the Fragile Pallet interaction

FragilePalletSpawnTime.Description: Amount of time for the pallet to spawn and become available for the Player, in seconds

VaultBlockerDistance.Description: cm, Maximum distance for the Window Vault Blocker interaction

VaultBlockerDuration.Description: Amount of time the window vault is blocked to Killer, in seconds

QuietModeFootstepNoiseModifier.Description: Quiet mode foot step sound modifier in %

QuietModeBloodPoolModifier.Description: Quiet mode pools of blood duration modifier in %

QuietModeLoudNoiseModifier.Description: Quiet mode rushed action loud noise modifier in %.

RemoteDestroyDistance.Description: cm, Maximum distance for the Remote Destroy interaction

RemoteDestroyDuration.Description: Amount of time for the pallet to break, in seconds

NegateStunPower.Description: Shorten the duration of the stun by a percentage value, 0.0 to 1.0

NegateStunDuration.Description: Duration of how long the Killer has the Endurance status effect, in seconds

RemoteHookDelay.Description: Time in second before the remote hook becomes available after a pickup

RemoteHookMinimumSurvivorDistance.Description: cm. Minimum distance between a hook and any other survivor for this hook to be selected

RemoteHookDistance.Description: cm. Maximum distance for the remote hook interaction

TFXPrioritizedCardAddedProbability.Description: Added probability of a card to be drawn in the prioritized conditions, 0.0 to 1.0

TFXSameCardOverridenProbability.Description: Base probability of a card to be drawn again, 0.0 to 1.0

TFXPool.Description: Number of cards that will be drawn in a match

MaxDistanceForMarionetteTakeover.Description: cm, Maximum distance that the marionette has to be to be taken over by Tryks

MinTimeTryksRemainsVisible.Description: s, Minimum time that in-game Tryks can remain visible (even if VO already stopped playing)

MinTimeLobbyTryksStaysHidden.Description: s, Minimum time that Tryks needs to stay hidden in the lobby

MaxTimeLobbyTryksStaysHidden.Description: s, Maximum time that Tryks needs to stay hidden in the lobby

LobbyTryksVoiceOverProbability.Description: <0,1>, Probability that lobby tryks VO gets triggered
